metadata.description:
Ryan Selkis, aka TwoBitIdiot, is the CEO and Co-founder of Messari. He is well known throughout the ecosystem for being a strong advocate for the proper regulation of crypto assets.

2021 has been an incredible year for Messari under Ryan’s leadership. Since January, the company has more than doubled in size and has developed several unique offerings designed to advance the ecosystem through transparency and accessibility.

It’s only right that we honor the man that made this possible as a Theses 2022 Hero.

[View animated art on IPFS](https://messari.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmcAYrZS22UXBbo2K2y9Msj9GKsdGg88xRtNADCnhP4TQk/Ryan%20Selkis.mp4). [View static art on IPFS.](https://messari.mypinata.cloud/ipfs/QmcAYrZS22UXBbo2K2y9Msj9GKsdGg88xRtNADCnhP4TQk/Ryan%20Selkis.jpg)
metadata.name: Ryan Selkis
